long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have an AI assistant everywhere you go. A ChatGPT Copilot / writing assistant on the web that is seamlessly integrated into your favorite web tools like your email inbox, Notion, Slack, Asana, Jira, Intercom, and even Google Docs or any other place on the web.

Right click on any text and let your AI assistant / ChatGPT copilot transform your web experience by summarizing content from any page, platform, Google Doc, or email thread. It can also act as your writing assistant while crafting your messages tailored to your current context, or extract tasks and unresolved items from your conversations.

Activating the Web Assistant is as easy as a right-click on any text. A drawer appears from the right, bringing the power of AI / ChatGPT to you anywhere on the web.

This extension will elevate your browser with Generative AI and uplift your capabilities while simplifying your tasks!

Currently powered by GPT-4.
